channel.title: 64bit run
channel.description:
When i try to run my client (Run (servername) (64-bit)) I get this error [IMG]http://i1215.photobucket.com/albums/cc502/cruel_ko/Screenshot7.png[/img] (best pic i cud get because it pops up and closes)
my run for the 64bit code it [code] @echo off title Client "C:/Program files (x86)/java/jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 EXIT [/code]
okay i figured out why closes so quick i had to change the exit with pause but this is what the cmd says [code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Jframe at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . . [/code]

item.title: 64bit run
item.dc:creator: @cruel_ko cruel ko
item.description:
@cruel_ko wrote:

When i try to run my client (Run (servername) (64-bit)) I get this error

Screenshot7.png1023Ã—575

(best pic i cud get because it pops up and closes)

my run for the 64bit code it

@echo off
title Client
"C:/Program files (x86)/java/jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32
EXIT

okay i figured out why closes so quick i had to change the exit with pause but this is what the cmd says

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Jframe
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
        at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: Jframe.  Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
